Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily life or work efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be of great value to you. I'm offering this exceptional item to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive benefits and service we provide. I look forward to hearing your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
